injective_of_injective_as_module:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/-

Authors: Jujian Zhang

theorem injective_of_injective_as_module [Injective (⟨A⟩ : ModuleCat ℤ)] :
    CategoryTheory.Injective (⟨A⟩ : AddCommGroupCat) :=
  {
    factors := fun X Y g f m => by
      skip
      let G : «expr ⟶ » (⟨X⟩ : ModuleCat ℤ) ⟨A⟩ :=
        { g with
          map_smul' := by
            intros
            rw [RingHom.id_apply, g.to_fun_eq_coe, map_zsmul] }
      let F : «expr ⟶ » (⟨X⟩ : ModuleCat ℤ) ⟨Y⟩ :=
        { f with
          map_smul' := by
            intros
            rw [RingHom.id_apply, f.to_fun_eq_coe, map_zsmul] }
      have : mono F := by
        refine' ⟨fun Z α β eq1 => _⟩
        let α' : «expr ⟶ » (AddCommGroupCat.of Z) X := α.to_add_monoid_hom
        let β' : «expr ⟶ » (AddCommGroupCat.of Z) X := β.to_add_monoid_hom
        have eq2 : «expr ≫ » α' f = «expr ≫ » β' f := by
          ext
          simp only [CategoryTheory.comp_apply, LinearMap.toAddMonoidHom_coe]
          simpa only [ModuleCat.coe_comp, LinearMap.coe_mk, Function.comp_apply] using FunLike.congr_fun eq1 x
        rw [cancel_mono] at eq2
        ext
        simpa only using FunLike.congr_fun eq2 x
      refine' ⟨(injective.factor_thru G F).to_add_monoid_hom, _⟩
      ext
      convert FunLike.congr_fun (injective.comp_factor_thru G F) x }
#align injective_of_injective_as_module injective_of_injective_as_module
injective_as_module_of_injective_as_Ab:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
theorem injective_as_module_of_injective_as_Ab [Injective (⟨A⟩ : AddCommGroupCat)] : Injective (⟨A⟩ : ModuleCat ℤ) :=
  {
    factors := fun X Y g f m => by
      skip
      let G : «expr ⟶ » (⟨X⟩ : AddCommGroupCat) ⟨A⟩ := g.to_add_monoid_hom
      let F : «expr ⟶ » (⟨X⟩ : AddCommGroupCat) ⟨Y⟩ := f.to_add_monoid_hom
      have : mono F := by
        rw [mono_iff_injective]
        intro _ _ h
        exact ((ModuleCat.mono_iff_injective f).mp m) h
      refine' ⟨{ injective.factor_thru G F with map_smul' := _ }, _⟩
      · intro m x
        rw [AddMonoidHom.toFun_eq_coe, RingHom.id_apply]
        induction' m using Int.induction_on with n hn n hn
        · rw [zero_smul]
          convert map_zero _
          convert zero_smul _ x
        · simp only [add_smul, map_add, hn, one_smul]
        · simp only [sub_smul, map_sub, hn, one_smul]
      ext
      convert FunLike.congr_fun (injective.comp_factor_thru G F) x }
#align injective_as_module_of_injective_as_Ab injective_as_module_of_injective_as_Ab
